statements: UPDATE wind_turbine_performance SET production_data = 1500.25, maintenance_status = 'Scheduled' WHERE turbine_id = 101 AND operating_hours > 5000;
UPDATE wind_turbine_performance SET maintenance_status = 'Emergency', operating_hours = 7000 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE wind_turbine_performance SET production_data = 1500.25, maintenance_status = 'Scheduled', operating_hours = 500 WHERE turbine_id = 101 AND id = 1;
UPDATE wind_turbine_performance SET maintenance_status = 'Completed', operating_hours = operating_hours + 50 WHERE id = 3 AND turbine_id = 102;
UPDATE WindTurbinePerformanceData SET last_inspection_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE turbine_id = 1;
UPDATE MaintenanceSchedule SET maintenance_type = 'Routine Checkup', maintenance_description = 'Performed routine inspection' WHERE maintenance_id = 3;
UPDATE WindTurbinePerformanceData SET location='New Location', last_inspection_date='2023-01-15' WHERE turbine_id=1;
UPDATE MaintenanceSchedule SET maintenance_type='Quarterly Maintenance',maintenance_description='Routine checkup' WHERE turbine_id=2;
UPDATE WindTurbine SET location = 'USA' WHERE turbine_id = 1;
UPDATE TurbinePerformance SET power_output = 5000.75, efficiency = 0.92 WHERE performance_id = 3;
UPDATE WindTurbine SET production_data = '{"daily_production": 500, "monthly_production": 15000}' WHERE turbine_id = 1;
UPDATE TurbinePerformance SET power_output = 200, efficiency = 0.85 WHERE performance_id = 3;
UPDATE WindTurbine SET model_name = 'Turbine A', location = 'Site A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TurbineSensorData SET power_output = 500.0, wind_speed = 25.5 WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE WindTurbine SET location='California', model_name='Model A' WHERE id=1
UPDATE TurbineSensorData SET wind_speed=15.5, power_output=500.75 WHERE sensor_id=1 AND timestamp='2022-08-15 12:00:00'
UPDATE WindTurbines SET location = 'New Location', capacity = 3.5 WHERE turbine_id = 101;
UPDATE EnergyProduction SET production_value = 2500.75, production_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE turbine_id = 202;
UPDATE WindTurbines SET manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp', capacity = 2.5 WHERE turbine_id = 101;
UPDATE TurbineMetrics SET metric_value = 1500.50, timestamp = '2022-04-20 10:30:00' WHERE metric_id = 201;
